L-Shape Profile Definition
==========================



```
concept {
    IfcLShapeProfileDef:ProfileType -> IfcProfileTypeEnum
    IfcLShapeProfileDef:ProfileName -> IfcLabel
    IfcLShapeProfileDef:Position -> IfcAxis2Placement2D
    IfcLShapeProfileDef:Position -> IfcAxis2Placement2D
    IfcLShapeProfileDef:Depth -> IfcPositiveLengthMeasure
    IfcLShapeProfileDef:Width -> IfcPositiveLengthMeasure
    IfcLShapeProfileDef:Thickness -> IfcPositiveLengthMeasure
    IfcLShapeProfileDef:FilletRadius -> IfcNonNegativeLengthMeasure
    IfcLShapeProfileDef:EdgeRadius -> IfcNonNegativeLengthMeasure
    IfcLShapeProfileDef:LegSlope -> IfcPlaneAngleMeasure
    IfcAxis2Placement2D:Location -> IfcCartesianPoint
    IfcAxis2Placement2D:Location -> IfcCartesianPoint
    IfcAxis2Placement2D:RefDirection -> IfcDirection
    IfcAxis2Placement2D:RefDirection -> IfcDirection
}
```
